tool_description:
A public unofficial API for Greek lottery numbers games (Super3, Extra5, Lotto
Proto, Tzoker). Always up to date and extremely fast (mongodb used for caching).
name: Greece OPAP lottary draw numbers
title: Greece OPAP lottary draw numbers

api_list.name: OPAPI

required_parameters.name: levelofdetail
required_parameters.description: Level of details. Possible values: GetSummary | GetDetais

required_parameters.name: drawnum
required_parameters.description: OPAP draw number (as appears on the slip)
